title: [Medicine] Cost effectiveness of nondrug interventions that reduce nursing home admissions for people with dementia: Maximizing Independence at Home, NYU Caregiver; Alzheimer's and Dementia Care; and Adult Day Service Plus all cost less and are more effective (i.e., cost savings) than usual care
